parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be trained. If a model with that name is already available, that model will be used for additional training. Otherwise a new model with this name will be instantiated.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: wait_for_store
parameters.description: Whether to wait for the model to be stored in the model repository. Setting this to true will ensure the model exists when proceeding to the next processor.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data must be of type Seq[Double].

parameters.name: label_field
parameters.description: The field the label is in. Value must be a double.

parameters.name: lambda
parameters.description: The shrinkage/regularization parameter (must be bigger than or equal to 0).

parameters.name: train_on_new_data
parameters.description: If set to true, the model is retrained every time new data is added. Can be costly in streaming settings. If set to false, the model is only trained upon serialization.
